Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the SH-SY5Y cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: Western blot analysis demonstrated a reduction in DJ-1 protein expression by approximately 30% in cells harboring the c.1148G>A variant.
Western blot analysis demonstrated a reduction in DJ-1 protein expression by approximately 25% in cells harboring the c.1562C>T variant.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent experiments were performed in triplicate.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type DJ-1 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: DJ-1 protein expression between 80% and 120% relative to baseline

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: DJ-1 protein expression less than 80% or greater than 120% relative to baseline
